column1: No New Relic Application ID configured, cannot continue with Cron Event reporting
column2: Nessun ID Applicazione New Relic configurato, non è è possibile continuare con il report degli eventi Cron

column1: The New Relic integration requires the newrelic-php5 agent, which is not installed. More information on installing the agent is available here.
column2: The New Relic integration requires the newrelic-php5 agent, which is not installed. More information on installing the agent is available here.

column1: Use %s to replace the account ID in the URL
column2: Usa %s per sostituire l'ID account nell'URL

column1: "Need a New Relic account? <a href="http://www.newrelic.com/magento" target="_blank">Click here to get one
column2: "Hai bisogno di un account New Relic? <a href="http://www.newrelic.com/magento" target="_blank">Clicca qui per averne uno

column1: This can commonly be found at the end of the URL when viewing the APM after "/applications/"
column2: Questo può essere trovato comunemente alla fine dell'URL quando si visualizza l'APM dopo "/applications/"

column1: This is located by navigating to Events -> Deployments from the New Relic APM website
column2: Si trova navigando in Eventi -> Deployments sul sito New Relic APM

column1: Generated under Insights in Manage data -> API Keys -> Insert Keys
column2: Generato in Insights in Manage data -> API Keys -> Insert Keys

column1: This is located by navigating to Settings from the New Relic APM website
column2: Si trova navigando in Impostazioni sul sito New Relic APM

column1: Send Adminhtml and Frontend as Separate Apps
column2: Send Adminhtml and Frontend as Separate Apps

column1: In addition to the main app (which includes all PHP execution), separate apps for adminhtml and frontend will be created. Requires New Relic Application Name to be set.
column2: In addition to the main app (which includes all PHP execution), separate apps for adminhtml and frontend will be created. Requires New Relic Application Name to be set.
